rows.label: qst201323_msg0002
rows.name: So we found them. About time.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0015
rows.name: Come on, let's go and save them!

rows.label: qst201323_msg0004
rows.name:
Simply defeating these villains would
not be difficult, but the children make
things more complicated.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0005
rows.name:
If we take too long rescuing them,
the crooks might use the children
as hostages. We can't allow that.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0007
rows.name:
You're right... But that doesn't mean
we can just stand around here!

rows.label: qst201323_msg0008
rows.name: Agreed. So let's split into two teams.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0009
rows.name:
I'll play the decoy, and draw
off the enemy.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0010
rows.name:
While they're distracted, the rest of
you can get the children to safety.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0011
rows.name:
Are you sure you can handle the
decoy mission on your own?

rows.label: qst201323_msg0012
rows.name:
Don't worry.
I can take care of myself.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0014
rows.name:
Of course. I wish you all the
best of luck as well.
